item.title: About
item.description: I am Yılmaz Barış Kaplan, currently studying my last semester at Istanbul Technical University, Turkey. You can find more details on my background at LinkedIn page. I am interested in reading different sources on philosophy, economics and politics. In this blog, I might share my thoughts and reviews on these topics. I also like working on puzzles and algorithm problems on my free time, I plan to share them occasionally.
